permafrost.tundra.data.transform

Class Transformer<V,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.data.transform.Transformer<V,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Input value class.
    T - Output transformed value class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigDecimalFormatter, Blankifier, Capitalizer, Condenser, DateTimeFormatter, Decoder, Decoder, Decoder, DurationFormatter, Encoder, Encoder, Encoder, Legalizer, Lowercaser, Nullifier, Prefixer, Replacer, Splitter, Squeezer, Stringifier, Suffixer, Translator, Trimmer, Truncator, Uncontroller, Unprefixer, Unsuffixer, Uppercaser

    public abstract class Transformer<V,T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class representing a transformer that operates on an IData's elements.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.Class<?> arrayClass
      The class of values held in an array or table to be transformed, calculated from the valueClass.
      protected boolean includeEmptyArrays
      Whether embedded IData and IData[] children should be recursively transformed.
      protected boolean includeEmptyDocuments
      Whether embedded IData and IData[] children should be recursively transformed.
      protected boolean includeNulls
      Whether embedded IData and IData[] children should be recursively transformed.
      protected TransformerMode mode
      The type of transformation required.
      protected boolean normalizeTransformedArrays
      Whether transformed arrays and tables should be normalized to use the nearest ancestor class of all items as the component type.
      protected boolean normalizeTransformedTables
      Whether transformed arrays and tables should be normalized to use the nearest ancestor class of all items as the component type.
      protected boolean recurse
      Whether embedded IData and IData[] children should be recursively transformed.
      protected java.lang.Class<?> tableClass
      The class of values held in an array or table to be transformed, calculated from the valueClass.
      protected java.lang.Class<?> transformedArrayClass
      The class of values held in an array or table to be transformed, calculated from the valueClass.
      protected java.lang.Class<T> transformedValueClass
      The class of values after they are transformed.
      protected java.lang.Class<V> valueClass
      The class of values to be transformed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transformer

        public Transformer(java.lang.Class<V> valueClass,
                   java.lang.Class<T> transformedValueClass,
                   TransformerMode mode,
                   boolean recurse,
                   boolean includeNulls,
                   boolean includeEmptyDocuments,
                   boolean includeEmptyArrays)
        Constructs a new Transformer object.
        Parameters:
        valueClass - The class of values to be transformed; only values that are instances of this class are transformed by the object.
        transformedValueClass - The class of transformed values.
        mode - The mode of transformation required.
        recurse - Whether to recursively transform child IData and IData[] objects.
        includeNulls - Whether null values should be included in transformed IData documents and IData[] document lists.
        includeEmptyDocuments - Whether empty IData documents should be included in the transformation.
        includeEmptyArrays - Whether empty arrays should be included in the transformation.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public com.wm.data.IData transform(com.wm.data.IData document)
        Transforms the elements of the given IData document.
        Parameters:
        document - The IData document whose elements are to be transformed.
        Returns:
        A new IData document containing the transformed elements from the given IData document.
